verses.verse: At the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H6256>time,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> will I be the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and they shall be my <S%H5971>people.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> The <S%H5971>people<s%> which were <S%H8300>left<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness;<s%> even <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> when I <S%H1980>went<s%> to cause him to <S%H7280>rest.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H7200>appeared<s%> of <S%H7350>old<s%> to me, saying, Yes, I have <S%H157>loved<s%> you with an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H160>love:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> with loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> have I <S%H4900>drawn<s%> you.

<S%H5750>Again<s%> I will <S%H1129>build<s%> you, and you shall be <S%H1129>built,<s%> O <S%H1330>virgin<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> you shall <S%H5750>again<s%> be <S%H5710>adorned<s%> with your <S%H8596>tabrets,<s%> and shall <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> in the dances of them that make <S%H7832>merry.<s%>

You shall <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H3754>vines<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria:<s%> the <S%H5193>planters<s%> shall <S%H5193>plant,<s%> and shall eat them as <S%H2490>common<s%> things.

For there shall be a <S%H3117>day,<s%> that the <S%H5341>watchmen<s%> on the <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> shall <S%H7121>cry,<s%> Arise you, and let us <S%H5927>go<s%> up to <S%H6726>Zion<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God.<s%>

For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H7442>Sing<s%> with <S%H8057>gladness<s%> for <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and <S%H6670>shout<s%> among the <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations:<s%> <S%H8085>publish<s%> you, <S%H1984>praise<s%> you, and <S%H559>say,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3467>save<s%> your <S%H5971>people,<s%> the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H935>bring<s%> them from the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H776>country,<s%> and <S%H6908>gather<s%> them from the <S%H3411>coasts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and with them the <S%H5787>blind<s%> and the <S%H6455>lame,<s%> the woman with <S%H2030>child<s%> and her that <S%H3205>travails<s%> with <S%H3205>child<s%> <S%H3162>together:<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6951>company<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H2008>thither.<s%>

They shall <S%H935>come<s%> with <S%H1065>weeping,<s%> and with <S%H8469>supplications<s%> will I <S%H2986>lead<s%> them: I will cause them to <S%H1980>walk<s%> by the <S%H5158>rivers<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%> in a <S%H3474>straight<s%> <S%H1870>way,<s%> wherein they shall not <S%H3782>stumble:<s%> for I am a <S%H1>father<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> is my <S%H1060>firstborn.<s%>

<S%H8085>Hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> O you <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and <S%H5046>declare<s%> it in the <S%H339>isles<s%> <S%H4801>afar<s%> off, and <S%H559>say,<s%> He that <S%H2219>scattered<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> will <S%H6908>gather<s%> him, and <S%H8104>keep<s%> him, as a <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> does his <S%H5739>flock.<s%>
For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and <S%H1350>ransomed<s%> him from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of him that was <S%H2388>stronger<s%> than he.

Therefore they shall <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H7442>sing<s%> in the <S%H4791>height<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and shall <S%H5102>flow<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> to the <S%H2898>goodness<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> for <S%H1715>wheat,<s%> and for <S%H8492>wine,<s%> and for <S%H3323>oil,<s%> and for the <S%H1121>young<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock<s%> and of the <S%H1241>herd:<s%> and their <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be as a <S%H7302>watered<s%> <S%H1588>garden;<s%> and they shall not <S%H1669>sorrow<s%> any <S%H3254>more<s%> at all.

Then shall the <S%H1330>virgin<s%> <S%H8057>rejoice<s%> in the <S%H4234>dance,<s%> both <S%H970>young<s%> men and <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H3162>together:<s%> for I will <S%H2015>turn<s%> their <S%H60>mourning<s%> into <S%H8342>joy,<s%> and will <S%H5162>comfort<s%> them, and make them <S%H8057>rejoice<s%> from their <S%H3015>sorrow.<s%>

And I will <S%H7301>satiate<s%> the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> with <S%H1880>fatness,<s%> and my <S%H5971>people<s%> shall be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with my <S%H2898>goodness,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> A <S%H6963>voice<s%> was <S%H8085>heard<s%> in <S%H7414>Ramah,<s%> <S%H5092>lamentation,<s%> and <S%H8563>bitter<s%> <S%H1065>weeping;<s%> <S%H7354>Rahel<s%> <S%H1058>weeping<s%> for her <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H3985>refused<s%> to be <S%H5162>comforted<s%> for her <S%H1121>children,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they were not.

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H4513>Refrain<s%> your <S%H6963>voice<s%> from <S%H1065>weeping,<s%> and your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> from <S%H1832>tears:<s%> for your <S%H6468>work<s%> shall be <S%H7939>rewarded,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and they shall <S%H7725>come<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy.<s%>

And there is <S%H8615>hope<s%> in your <S%H319>end,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that your <S%H1121>children<s%> shall <S%H7725>come<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> to their own <S%H1366>border.<s%>

I have surely <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H5110>bemoaning<s%> himself thus; You have <S%H3256>chastised<s%> me, and I was <S%H3256>chastised,<s%> as a <S%H5695>bullock<s%> <S%H3808>unaccustomed<s%> <S%H3925><s%> to the yoke: <S%H7725>turn<s%> you me, and I shall be <S%H7725>turned;<s%> for you are the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H3588>Surely<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> that I was <S%H7725>turned,<s%> I <S%H5162>repented;<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> that I was <S%H3045>instructed,<s%> I <S%H5606>smote<s%> on my <S%H3409>thigh:<s%> I was <S%H954>ashamed,<s%> <S%H1571>yes,<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> <S%H3637>confounded,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> I did <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of my <S%H5271>youth.<s%>

Is <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> my <S%H3357>dear<s%> <S%H1121>son?<s%> is he a <S%H8191>pleasant<s%> <S%H3206>child?<s%> for <S%H1767>since<s%> I <S%H1696>spoke<s%> against him, I do earnestly <S%H2142>remember<s%> him <S%H5750>still:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> my <S%H4578>bowels<s%> are <S%H1993>troubled<s%> for him; I will surely have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> on him, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H5324>Set<s%> you up <S%H6725>markers,<s%> <S%H7760>make<s%> you <S%H8564>high<s%> <S%H8564>heaps:<s%> <S%H7896>set<s%> your <S%H3820>heart<s%> toward the <S%H4546>highway,<s%> even the <S%H1870>way<s%> which you <S%H1980>went:<s%> <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H7725>again,<s%> O <S%H1330>virgin<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H428>these<s%> your <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

<S%H5704>How<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> will you <S%H2559>go<s%> <S%H2559>about,<s%> O you <S%H7728>backsliding<s%> <S%H1323>daughter?<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H1254>created<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> thing in the <S%H776>earth,<s%> A <S%H5347>woman<s%> shall <S%H5437>compass<s%> a <S%H1397>man.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> As <S%H5750>yet<s%> they shall <S%H559>use<s%> <S%H1931>this<s%> <S%H2088><s%> <S%H1697>speech<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> thereof, when I shall <S%H7725>bring<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> their <S%H7622>captivity;<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> you, O <S%H5116>habitation<s%> of <S%H6664>justice,<s%> and <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H6944>holiness.<s%>

And there shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah<s%> itself, and in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> thereof <S%H3162>together,<s%> <S%H406>farmers,<s%> and they that <S%H5265>go<s%> <S%H5265>forth<s%> with <S%H5739>flocks.<s%>
For I have <S%H7301>satiated<s%> the <S%H5889>weary<s%> <S%H5315>soul,<s%> and I have <S%H4390>replenished<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H1669>sorrowful<s%> <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
On <S%H2063>this<s%> I <S%H6974>awaked,<s%> and <S%H7200>beheld;<s%> and my <S%H8142>sleep<s%> was <S%H6149>sweet<s%> to me.

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that I will <S%H2232>sow<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> with the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> and with the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H929>beast.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, that like as I have <S%H8245>watched<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them, to <S%H5428>pluck<s%> up, and to <S%H5422>break<s%> <S%H5422>down,<s%> and to <S%H2040>throw<s%> <S%H2040>down,<s%> and to <S%H6>destroy,<s%> and to <S%H7489>afflict;<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> will I <S%H8245>watch<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them, to <S%H1129>build,<s%> and to <S%H5193>plant,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

In <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> they shall <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more,<s%> The <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H398>eaten<s%> a <S%H1155>sour<s%> <S%H1155>grape,<s%> and the <S%H1121>children's<s%> <S%H8127>teeth<s%> are set on <S%H6949>edge.<s%>

But every <S%H376>one<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%> for his own <S%H5771>iniquity:<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> that <S%H398>eats<s%> the <S%H1155>sour<s%> <S%H1155>grape,<s%> his <S%H8127>teeth<s%> shall be set on <S%H6949>edge.<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that I will <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and with the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah:<s%>

Not according to the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> that I <S%H3772>made<s%> with their <S%H1>fathers<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I <S%H2388>took<s%> them by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> to <S%H3318>bring<s%> them out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> they <S%H6565>broke,<s%> although I was an <S%H1167>husband<s%> to them, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%>

But <S%H2063>this<s%> shall be the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> that I will <S%H3772>make<s%> with the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H310>After<s%> <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> I will <S%H5414>put<s%> my <S%H8451>law<s%> in their <S%H7130>inward<s%> parts, and <S%H3789>write<s%> it in their <S%H3820>hearts;<s%> and will be their <S%H430>God,<s%> and they shall be my <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And they shall <S%H3925>teach<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> and every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H251>brother,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Know the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> for they shall <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> me, from the <S%H6996>least<s%> of them to the <S%H1419>greatest<s%> of them, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> for I will <S%H5545>forgive<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> and I will <S%H2142>remember<s%> their <S%H2403>sin<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> which <S%H5414>gives<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%> for a <S%H216>light<s%> by <S%H3119>day,<s%> and the <S%H2708>ordinances<s%> of the <S%H3394>moon<s%> and of the <S%H3556>stars<s%> for a <S%H216>light<s%> by <S%H3915>night,<s%> which <S%H7280>divides<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> when the <S%H1530>waves<s%> thereof <S%H1993>roar;<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> is his <S%H8034>name:<s%>

<S%H518>If<s%> <S%H428>those<s%> <S%H2706>ordinances<s%> <S%H4185>depart<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> me, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> then the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> shall <S%H7673>cease<s%> from <S%H1961>being<s%> a <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me for <S%H3605>ever.<s%> <S%H3117><s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H4605>above<s%> can be <S%H4058>measured,<s%> and the <S%H4146>foundations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H2713>searched<s%> out <S%H4295>beneath,<s%> I will <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3988>cast<s%> off <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> that they have <S%H6213>done,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall be <S%H1129>built<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> from the <S%H4026>tower<s%> of <S%H2606>Hananeel<s%> to the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H6438>corner.<s%>

And the <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H6957>line<s%> shall <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H5048>over<s%> <S%H5048>against<s%> it on the <S%H1389>hill<s%> <S%H1619>Gareb,<s%> and shall <S%H5437>compass<s%> about to <S%H1601>Goath.<s%>

And the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H6010>valley<s%> of the <S%H6297>dead<s%> <S%H6297>bodies,<s%> and of the <S%H1880>ashes,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8309>fields<s%> to the <S%H5158>brook<s%> of <S%H6939>Kidron,<s%> to the <S%H6438>corner<s%> of the <S%H5483>horse<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> toward the <S%H4217>east,<s%> shall be <S%H6944>holy<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> it shall not be <S%H5428>plucked<s%> up, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H2040>thrown<s%> <S%H2040>down<s%> any <S%H5750>more<s%> for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>
